adrFormatAddress: 1231 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: I am a new cat dad and in researching where to take my baby, Small Door Veterinary came on top of all my searches. And everything I read about them was 100% true. All the staff was very professional, courteous and caring. We had the pleasure to have Dr. Robert Gonzalez and vet tech Miriam, and they were amazing! Hazel was very shy, but they were patient and handled her with such care that she allowed them to do a very thorough wellness examination. After the examination, Dr. Gonzalez took the time to give me advice and tips as a new cat dad. I also appreciated how transparent they were upfront about the costs of all treatments. I cannot recommend Small Door Veterinary enough. Thank you for being so wonderful to Hazel!

originalText.text: When I got my puppy, Ivy, the thought of finding her the perfect vet stressed me out, no matter where I looked, no place seemed like the right fitâ€” that is until I discovered small door. Small Door is 100% worth every cent. From the espresso they offer me when I walk in, to the puppy play groups and outstanding care they show my pup, there is no where, where Small Door misses the mark. They pay attention to every detail and put you at the center of everything they do and their care shows. I never write reviews but could not miss the opportunity to recognize the amazing facilities and teams that make small door the beauty it is.

originalText.text: We love Small Door! Our main location was West Village but we moved and are so glad that Small Door has many locations. Especially one right near where we moved. Dr. Richardson is the best! Thank you to the staff for making such a welcoming environment. We recently went to take pics at their valentines Photo Booth and it was so much fun!

originalText.text: Both of my recently adopted kittens LOVE Small Door Vet ðŸ§¡ We have been very well accommodated every time we go. Their space is sooo clean and beautiful, and they always offer me a beverage when I arrive. During my first appointment with Small Door, they gave my kittens a wonderful tote of toys to bring home! The staff is so knowledgeable, professional, and fun to chat with. I love that they are so responsive when I ask them questions through their app. I highly recommend Small Door to those who have pets at home âœ¨

originalText.text: We love it! We just switched vets. The doctor took her time with us, we didn't feel pressured to rush. She informed me about so many options asked us which best fits us. Was kind with Bulma, amazing front desk. Not over crowded. We absolutely LOVE OUR NEW VET!!!
